title: Expert & Deposition
subtitle: 30 tasks â€” Assign non party deposition procedure through System Automation

tasks.label: Get approval to begin non party depos
tasks.sla: 75 days after complaint is filed
tasks.function: If approved, mark approved, if disapproved, market disapproved, or postpone to assigned date
tasks.notes: Get approval from Atty to begin non party depos

tasks.label: Prepare the notice, cover letter, and send
tasks.sla: 1 hour after approval granted
tasks.function: Once complete, mark complete
tasks.notes: Schedule none party depositions, serve Notice and Cvr Ltr via cert mail or service processor, cc to defense counsel

tasks.label: Schedule the court reporter
tasks.sla: 1 hour after approval granted
tasks.function: Once complete, mark complete
tasks.notes: Schedule none party depositions, serve Notice and Cvr Ltr via cert mail or service processor, cc to defense counsel

tasks.label: Prepare the notice or cross notice, cover letter, and send
tasks.sla: 75 days after complaint is filed
tasks.function: Once complete, mark complete
tasks.notes: Schedule defendants deposition, serve Notice and Cvr Ltr via cert mail or service processor

tasks.label: Schedule the court reporter and intepretor
tasks.sla: 75 days after complaint is filed
tasks.function: Input the date of depo, mark complete
tasks.notes: Schedule defendants deposition, serve Notice and Cvr Ltr via cert mail or service processor

tasks.label: Verify depo confirmed or reschedule new date
tasks.sla: 1 day before scheduled depo
tasks.function: Verify depo confirmed or reschedule new date
tasks.notes: Verify depo confirmed or reschedule new date

tasks.label: Confirm email from Atty on all experts. Input information for Expert 1, Expert 2, Expert 3, and so on(1-10). Expert i...
tasks.sla: 2 days after the Discovery Appt with the client, line 15 of the Discovery tab
tasks.function: Once email is recieved, mark complete, input all required expert info, mark submit
tasks.notes: Confirming expert directive from Atty and inputting info on all experts

tasks.label: Retain Expert 1 Attempt 1
tasks.sla: 10am on day 10 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V1, send SMS 1, send Email 1, mark "Retain Expert 1 Attempt 3"
tasks.notes: Call expert, confirm fee and form of payment, get retainer and retain, schedul necessary appt

tasks.label: Retain Expert 1 Attempt 2
tasks.sla: 1pm on day 11 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V2, send SMS 2, send Email 2, mark "Retain Expert 1 Attempt 3"
tasks.notes: Call expert, confirm fee and form of payment, get retainer and retain, schedul necessary appt

tasks.label: Retain Expert 1 Attempt 3
tasks.sla: 4pm on day 11 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V3, send SMS 3, send Email 3, mark "Retain Expert 1 Attempt 3"
tasks.notes: Call expert, confirm fee and form of payment, get retainer and retain, schedul necessary appt

tasks.label: Retain and schedule Expert
tasks.sla: 1 hour once we send IME/Report request
tasks.function: Expert retained, mark complete, input schedule date
tasks.notes: Input that expert has been retained and scheduled

tasks.label: Replace Expert, begin 3 attempt steps again
tasks.sla: 5pm on day 11 after the Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: Update contact info for new expert, mark complete
tasks.notes: Find a new expert that will be responsive

tasks.label: IME/Report request to Expert
tasks.sla: 1 hour after we confirm schedule with the expert
tasks.function: IME/Report Request sent to Expert, mark complete
tasks.notes: Letter to expert encl file documents/films for expert rep

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 1
tasks.sla: 10am on day 10 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V1, send SMS 1, send Email 1, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 1"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 2
tasks.sla: 1pm on day 11 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V2, send SMS 2, send Email 2, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 2"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 3
tasks.sla: 4pm on day 11 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V3, send SMS 3, send Email 3, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 3"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 4
tasks.sla: 5pm on day 11 after the Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: Update contact info for new expert, mark complete
tasks.notes: Find a new expert that will be responsive

tasks.label: Upload expert reporting for each Expert
tasks.sla: 1 hour from when the report is recieved
tasks.function: Upload expert reporting for each Expert, each upload generates a system notification to the Atty that a report needs to be reviewed, mark complete
tasks.notes: Upload expert reporting for each Expert

tasks.label: Review the Expert Report
tasks.sla: 1 week from when the report is uploaded. Each report will require its own individual cadence
tasks.function: Review the Expert Report, after review, if accepted, mark approved. If not approved, mark not approved, complete notes as to why. If approved or not approved, the system will notify para of outcome.
tasks.notes: Review the Expert Report

tasks.label: Supportive Admin 1
tasks.sla: 3 hours from when the notification is sent
tasks.function: Complete supportive administrative task to amend ROGS, mark complete or to send back to the expert to remedy
tasks.notes: Supportive Admin Task

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 1
tasks.sla: 10am on day 19 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V1, send SMS 1, send Email 1, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 1"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 2
tasks.sla: 1pm on day 19 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V2, send SMS 2, send Email 2, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 2"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 3
tasks.sla: 4pm on day 19 after Plaintiff discovery served
tasks.function: If connected, mark "Complete", if not connected, drop V3, send SMS 3, send Email 3, mark "Follow up Expert 1 Attempt 3"
tasks.notes: Follow up with Expert to recieve report

tasks.label: Upload amended expert reporting for each Expert
tasks.sla: 1 hour from when the report is recieved
tasks.function: Upload expert reporting for each Expert, each upload generates a system notification to the Atty that a report needs to be reviewed, mark complete
tasks.notes: Upload amended expert reporting for each Expert

tasks.label: Review the Amended Expert Report
tasks.sla: 1 week from when the report is uploaded. Each report will require its own individual cadence
tasks.function: Review the Amended Expert Report, after review, if accepted, mark approved. If not approved, mark not approved, complete notes as to why. If approved or not approved, the system will notify para of outcome.
tasks.notes: Review the Amended Expert Report

tasks.label: Report on when the client depo is completed or why it was rescheduled. This will be repeated many times
tasks.sla: 1 hour after the client was completed or rescheduled
tasks.function: Report on when the client depo is completed, mark complete, choose drop down option as to why it was rescheduled,
tasks.notes: Client depo tracking

tasks.label: Supportive Admin 1
tasks.sla: 3 hours from when the notification is sent
tasks.function: Complete supportive administrative task to amend ROGS, mark complete
tasks.notes: Supportive Admin Task

tasks.label: Plaintiff IME Notice to client
tasks.sla: 1 hour from when the appt is scheduled with the expert (line 14)
tasks.function: Send client IME notice, mark complete, if 2 medical experts, add IME for each applicable expert.
tasks.notes: Send client IME notice

tasks.label: IME/Inspection reminder to cleint
tasks.sla: 10 days before apppointment
tasks.function: Text, recorded voicemail, and email
tasks.notes: send client text message with IME?Inspection Reminder

tasks.label: IME/Inspection reminder to cleint
tasks.sla: 1 day before appointment
tasks.function: Text and email
tasks.notes: send client text message with IME?Inspection Reminder
